insecureContextWarning.description: Your connection is not secure, the app must be served over HTTPS to work properly. You won't be able to create or view notes.

login.title: Login to Enclosed
login.description: This is a private instance of Enclosed. Enter your credentials to be able to create notes.

errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

footer: Contact the owner of the instance.

errors.empty-note: Please enter a note content or attach a file.
errors.rate-limit: You have exceeded the rate limit for creating notes. Please try again later.
errors.too-large: The note content and attachments are too large. Please reduce the size and try again.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to create notes. Please login and try again.
errors.api-not-found: The API endpoint is not found. The server may not be configured correctly.
errors.unknown: An error occurred while creating the note, please try again.

share.title: Shared note
share.description: Here is a note shared with you.

drop-files.title: Drop files here
drop-files.description: Drag and drop files here to attach them to the note

success.title: Note created successfully
success.description: Your note has been created. You can now share it using the following link.
success.with-deletion: The note will be deleted after reading.

qr-code.title: Share this note on mobile
qr-code.description: You can scan this QR code to view the note on your mobile device. You can also export the QR code image to share it with others.

assets.heading-multiple: {{ count }} files attached to this note

request-password.description: This note is password protected. Please enter the password to unlock it.

form.label: Password
form.invalid: The password you entered is invalid or the note URL is incorrect.

warn-for-note-deletion.title: This note will be deleted
warn-for-note-deletion.description: This note has been configured to be deleted after reading. After displaying the note, it will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
warn-for-note-deletion.confirm: I understand, show me the note

invalid-url.title: Invalid note URL
invalid-url.description: This note URL is invalid. Please make sure you are using the correct URL.

rate-limit.title: Rate limit exceeded
rate-limit.description: You have exceeded the rate limit for fetching notes. Please try again later.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.description: This note is private. You need to be logged in to view it.

note-not-found.title: Note not found
note-not-found.description: This note does not exist, has expired, or has been deleted.

fetch-error.title: An error occurred
fetch-error.description: An error occurred while fetching the note. Please try again later.

decryption.title: An error occurred
decryption.description: An error occurred while decrypting the note. The url may be invalid.
